name: jorge's cake
description: this is very sweet and adorable to look at

name: Caramel Macchiato Ice Cream
description: This caramel macchiato ice cream is frozen bliss. It's a frosty, homemade version of that famous coffee shop's macchiato.

name: Grilled Greek Yogurt-Marinated Chicken
description: This Greek yogurt-marinated chicken infused with lemon is delicious. There is something special about what yogurt does to chicken in its smoky, sizzling time over charcoal. It imparts a tanginess that enhances all the other flavors and grills to a caramelized dark brown without tasting burnt.
